item.title: Unsung Heros of Interconnected world - APIs
item.description: In this series of article i would be explaining what is an API and what are the uses. How is it useful and what are the types of APIs. In other parts of the series i would be discussing other aspects of API such as authenication and authorization, securing API, data validation, rate limiting and throttling, error handling and logging, secure storage solutions, least previlages prinicples, security testing, regular updates and patching and api documentation and education.
